name: Swim Team Invitation Notification Pipeline
description: The pipeline is designed to send competition invitation notifications to swim team players, informing them of their participation in an upcoming event.

parameters.name: coachEmail
parameters.label: Coach Email Address -  Sender
parameters.description: Email address of the coach that will be sending invitation notifications to swim team players. NOTE: This email has to be previously verified to be able to send emails.

Extract Swim Team Roster Competitions.description: Extracts swim team roster competitions data from the database.

config.selectQuery:
select
     roster.player_name
    ,roster.birth_date
    ,roster.phone_number
    ,roster.email_address
    ,roster.parent_name
    ,roster.team_name
    ,roster.organization
    ,roster.yr
    ,roster.coach_name
    ,roster.coach_phone_number
    ,competitions.competition
from 
    custom_insights.team_roster as roster
join (
    select distinct player_name
    from custom_insights.team_roster
    order by player_name
    limit 2
) as selected_players
    on roster.player_name = selected_players.player_name
join 
    custom_insights.team_competitions as competitions 
    on roster.player_name = competitions.player_name;

Accumulate Roster Competitions.description: Aggregates team member records into a roster collection.

Group Competitions for Team Players.description: Groups and aggregates competitions by player.

For Each Team Player.description: Iterates over each team player in the roster.

config.template:
Swim Competition Notification

Dear {{message.header.player.parent_name}},

We are thrilled to inform you that {{message.header.player.name}} has been selected to compete in the upcoming swim competitions representing the {{message.header.general.team_name}}.

The events are proudly organized by {{message.header.general.organization}} and will take place during the {{message.header.general.year}} season.

Participant Details:

  • Name: {{message.header.player.name}}
  • Birth Date: {{message.header.player.birth_date}}
  • Contact Number: {{message.header.player.phone_number}}
  • Email Address: {{message.header.player.email_address}}

Coach Contact Information:

  • Coach Name: {{message.header.coach.name}}
  • Phone Number: {{message.header.coach.phone_number}}
  • Email Address: {{message.header.coach.email_address}}

Competitions Attending:

    {{#message.header.player.competitions}}
  • {{.}}
    • {{/message.header.player.competitions}}

We are proud of {{message.header.player.name}}'s dedication and commitment, and we look forward to a great performance in the upcoming events.

Sincerely,
Swim Team Administration

© {{message.header.general.year}} {{message.header.general.organization}}. All rights reserved.

{{message.header.general.organization}}

Dear {{message.header.player.name}},

Please find attached your official team member information for the upcoming swim competition.

The document includes key details such as your team name ({{message.header.general.team_name}}), season, and your coach’s contact information. We kindly ask that you review this information and notify us of any necessary updates.

We are proud to have you representing our team, and we are confident you will perform with excellence in the competition.

Should you have any questions, please feel free to reach out.

Sincerely,
Swim Team Administration
